title: Define System Architecture
description: Create a high-level design for the AI security system that outlines how it will detect and prevent threats autonomously.

title: Develop AI Algorithm for Threat Detection
description: Design and implement the AI model that will be responsible for identifying potential threats. This task involves selecting appropriate machine learning techniques, training the model with relevant data, and integrating it into our existing security system.

title: Implement Real-time Monitoring Capabilities (with improvements)
description: Develop a real-time monitoring system that continuously logs, alerts, and responds to potential network threats. The system should include the ability to: 1) Log events for analysis and auditing purposes. 2) Alert the relevant personnel of potential threats in real-time. 3) Implement automated responses to certain types of threats. This task depends on the completion of 'Define System Architecture'.

title: Create User Interface for System Management
description: Design and build a user-friendly interface for administrators to manage the system, including features such as system status monitoring, configuration settings, and security alerts.

title: Develop Algorithm for Threat Prevention
description: Create the AI model that will take appropriate actions to prevent detected threats.
dependencies: Develop AI Algorithm for Threat Detection

title: Implement Comprehensive Security Measures
description: Ensure the system is secure by implementing robust security measures to protect against potential exploits. This includes but is not limited to: access controls, data encryption, and regular security audits.

title: Perform System Testing and Integration
description: Thoroughly test the system to ensure all components are working correctly and integrate them. This includes testing AI threat detection algorithms, real-time monitoring capabilities, user interface, and threat prevention mechanisms.
dependencies: Develop AI Algorithm for Threat Detection
Create User Interface for System Management

title: Document the System Design and Implementation
description: Write clear, concise, and detailed documentation covering the system's design, implementation, usage, and any relevant technical or functional aspects. Include sections for integration with existing systems if applicable.
dependencies: Develop AI Algorithm for Threat Detection
Create User Interface for System Management
